title: Is Resident Evil 4 Remake Happening? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.13.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about the reports of a Resident Evil 4 remake coming in 2022.

Time Stamps - 
00:08:30 - Housekeeping
We Have Cool Friends featuring Genevieve St-Onge is live right after this. You can watch that on Twitch.tv/KindafunnyGames, Youtube.com/KindaFunny OR listen to it on the We Have Cool Friends Podcast feed.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:30 - Is Resident Evil 4 Remake Happening? - Andy Robinson @ Video Games Chronicle
00:20:40 - 1. Is Resident Evil going to release games yearly going forward with RE2 last year, RE3 this year, RE8 next year and 4 in 2022? 2. Will RE4 remake, if released in 2022, be on both current and next gen consoles? Or just next gen? 3. Is giving the developer until 2022 to work on RE4, which seems like more time than the other remakes, due to Capcom wanting to release 8 in between remake releases?  - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:27:03 - Resident Evil 3 remake ships 2 million in five days - Brendain Sinclair @ GIBiz
00:33:20 - That Final Fantasy VII Remake really do be sellin in the UK - Christopher Dring @ GIBiz
00:39:08 - The ESRB is acknowledging loot boxes - Brendan Sinclair @ GIBiz
00:42:30 - Is Crysis making a return? - Liam Croft @ Push Square
00:48:05 - Out today
00:49:00 -  HIMS
00:51:00 - QUIP
Reader mail   -
00:53:00 -  - Jamie S
00:59:50 - Squad Up: Jay Yi (Podcast platforms) - We Are Not Game Devs
01:00:42 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Imran
